materials.raw_text:
B: 120 g 
 Pa: 75 g 
 Tc: 100 g 
 Tm: 80 g

sourcing.instructions:
B (Boron): Available from chemical supply stores or online suppliers. 
 Pa (Palladium): Obtainable from precious metal suppliers or specialized chemical vendors. 
 Tc (Technetium): Acquire from licensed nuclear material suppliers (ensure proper handling and safety protocols). 
 Tm (Thulium): Available from rare earth material suppliers or chemical distributors.
